description: Guidelines for using illustrations across the VibeX application. Ensures visual consistency and alignment with brand identity.
style: Flat, modern, line-based SaaS illustrations with clean vectors and scalable usage.

usage.onboarding: Use welcoming, playful illustrations that match the brand palette to guide new users.
usage.emptyStates: Use minimal, explanatory illustrations with light accents to indicate no data or content.

errorPages.404: Friendly illustration with neutral colors to soften error messaging.
errorPages.500: Technical yet approachable illustration, with emphasis on retry/help.

usage.marketing: More expressive, storytelling illustrations for landing and promo pages.

rules: All illustrations must follow the brand color tokens (primary, accent, neutral).
File format must be SVG for scalability, fallback PNG if needed.
Do not use stock photography; only vector-based illustrations.
Ensure accessibility: illustrations should not carry critical information alone (must be paired with text).
Maintain consistency: avoid mixing different illustration styles in the same flow.
